summary: THE VEHICLE HAS A VIBRATION.  THE DEALER STATED THAT THE VIBRATION IS CAUSED BY THE SUSPENSION AND THAT THERE IS NOTHING THEY CAN DO ABOUT IT UNTIL A NEW MODEL COMES OUT. CONSUMER INDICATED OF HAVING PROBLEM WITH  A FOUR SET OF TIRES ON THE VEHICLE WHICH ARE ORIGINAL EQUIPMENT TIRES MODEL #P225/60R16 MODEL.    *NLM
